PageLabel: Check if you need to complete the claim timeline template

FieldShowCondition: showConditionFlags CONTAINS "CAN_ANSWER_RESPONDENT_1" AND respondent1Copy.type!="COMPANY" AND respondent1Copy.type!="ORGANISATION"
showConditionFlags CONTAINS "CAN_ANSWER_RESPONDENT_1" AND respondent1Copy.type!="INDIVIDUAL" AND respondent1Copy.type!="SOLE_TRADER"
addRespondent2 = "Yes" AND showConditionFlags CONTAINS "CAN_ANSWER_RESPONDENT_2" AND respondent2Copy.type!="COMPANY" AND respondent2Copy.type!="ORGANISATION"

PageShowCondition: addApplicant2 = "Yes"
respondent2SameLegalRepresentative = "Yes"
defendantSingleResponseToBothClaimants = "No"
defendantSingleResponseToBothClaimants != "No"

FieldShowCondition: respondent2ClaimResponseTypeForSpec = "FULL_DEFENCE" AND showConditionFlags CONTAINS "CAN_ANSWER_RESPONDENT_2" AND respondentResponseIsSame !="Yes"

PageShowCondition: respondentClaimResponseTypeForSpecGeneric="FULL_DEFENCE" OR respondent2ClaimResponseTypeForSpec="FULL_DEFENCE" OR claimant1ClaimResponseTypeForSpec="FULL_DEFENCE" OR claimant2ClaimResponseTypeForSpec="FULL_DEFENCE"

FieldShowCondition: showConditionFlags CONTAINS "ONLY_RESPONDENT_1_DISPUTES" OR showConditionFlags CONTAINS "ONLY_RESPONDENT_2_DISPUTES"  OR showConditionFlags CONTAINS "BOTH_RESPONDENTS_DISPUTE"

respondent1ClaimResponseTypeForSpec="DO_NOT_SHOW" AND responseClaimTrack!="FAST_CLAIM"

showConditionFlags CONTAINS "CAN_ANSWER_RESPONDENT_1" OR showConditionFlags CONTAINS "SOMEONE_DISPUTES" AND responseClaimTrack = "SMALL_CLAIM" AND showCarmFields="Yes" AND respondentClaimResponseTypeForSpecGeneric != "FULL_ADMISSION"

showConditionFlags CONTAINS "CAN_ANSWER_RESPONDENT_1" OR showConditionFlags CONTAINS "SOMEONE_DISPUTES" AND responseClaimTrack = "SMALL_CLAIM" AND showCarmFields="No" AND respondentClaimResponseTypeForSpecGeneric != "FULL_ADMISSION"
responseClaimTrack != "SMALL_CLAIM" AND showConditionFlags CONTAINS "SOMEONE_DISPUTES"

showConditionFlags CONTAINS "CAN_ANSWER_RESPONDENT_1" OR showConditionFlags CONTAINS "SOMEONE_DISPUTES" AND responseClaimTrack = "SMALL_CLAIM" AND respondentClaimResponseTypeForSpecGeneric != "FULL_ADMISSION"

showConditionFlags CONTAINS "CAN_ANSWER_RESPONDENT_1" OR showConditionFlags CONTAINS "SOMEONE_DISPUTES" AND responseClaimTrack = "SMALL_CLAIM" AND respondentClaimResponseTypeForSpecGeneric != "FULL_ADMISSION"

showConditionFlags CONTAINS "CAN_ANSWER_RESPONDENT_1" OR showConditionFlags CONTAINS "SOMEONE_DISPUTES" AND responseClaimTrack = "SMALL_CLAIM" AND respondentClaimResponseTypeForSpecGeneric != "FULL_ADMISSION"
responseClaimTrack != "SMALL_CLAIM" AND showConditionFlags CONTAINS "SOMEONE_DISPUTES"
